Package org.neo4j.test.extension

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DbmsController
    Implementations of this interface can be injected into DbmsExtension based tests, to allow them to restart the DBMS or the database the test is operating on.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DbmsSupportController  
    DbmsSupportController.TestConfiguration
    Test configuration extracted from a test extension annotation.
    DbmsSupportExtension  
    DefaultFileSystemExtension  
    DisabledWithQueryRoutingExtension  
    EphemeralFileSystemExtension  
    ExecutionSharedContext  
    FileSystemExtension<T extends FileSystemAbstraction>  
    LifeExtension  
    Neo4jLayoutSupportExtension
    Be aware that all layouts regarding directory layout provided by this extension, i.e Neo4JLayout, DatabaseLayout is reflecting a default setup.
    OtherThreadExtension  
    ProfilerExtension
    A sampling profiler extension for JUnit 5.
    RandomExtension  
    StatefulFieldExtension<T>  
    SuppressOutputExtension  
    TestInstanceValidationExtension
    Validation junit extension to verify that all fields that were marked as injectable with @Inject annotation were assigned by test container.
    ThreadLeakageGuardExtension  
    ThreadLeakageGuardExtension.ThreadIds  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ThreadLeakageGuardExtension.StacktraceHolderException  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    BoltDbmsExtension
    See DbmsExtension for documentation.
    DbmsExtension
    Provides test access to DatabaseManagementService.
    DisabledForRoot
    Used to disable test that have problem executing as root, e.g. in a docker containers.
    DisabledWithQueryRouting  
    EphemeralNeo4jLayoutExtension  
    ExtensionCallback
    Annotation for removing unused warnings for methods called by reflection.
    ImpermanentDbmsExtension
    See DbmsExtension for documentation.
    Inject  
    Neo4jLayoutExtension  
    SkipThreadLeakageGuard
